attributes.action: Commission a review into the impact of the pandemic on mental health in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Covid-19 and the measures taken to deal with it have had a huge effect on mental health. At Good Mental Health we see the results daily and know how much people are going to need support to come out of this. Children will face the impact for years to come, adults have had to adjust to a way of life that will leave emotional scars and frontline workers will be dealing with the impact of things they have faced for the rest of their lives.
attributes.background: The pandemic has had a huge impact on mental health and we would like the government to gain actual data as to what that impact has been.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign this petition which we currently have open, which address reviewing the impact of the pandemic on mental health as well as other aspects:

Establish a cross-party, cross-discipline panel to scrutinise Covid-19 policies
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551051
